name: Gun:Zero
description:
Run around the world and survive as song as you can.

(turn your volume down)

A,D - Move

W -Jump

Left Mouse - Shoot

Y - Restart

T - Toggle Full-screen

Shoot the Bats, Destroy The Drills, Survive.

Programming,Art,Sound - Storm Hughes

Twitter: @boxheadpixelart - https://twitter.com/boxheadpixelart

Please give me feedback :)
